name: Pamela Fryman
info:
• 别名: パメラ・フライマン
  • 生日: 1959-08-19
  • 出生地: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States
  • 职业: Television director and producer
detail: Pamela Fryman (born August 19, 1959) is an American sitcom director and producer. She is best known for directing all but twelve episodes of the hit series How I Met Your Mother.

works.name: Friends (Season 1) / 老友记 第一季
